comment.author: 38561291@N04
comment._content: We do not know what the text on the blackboard says - I believe it's in Polish - any help translating would be appreciated.
comment.authorname: Law Society of Upper Canada Archives

comment.author: 99969845@N00
comment._content: It is Polish. Loosely translated it means "Self study at Union P. P. Toronto 10 [March or May] 1919."

comment.author: 38561291@N04
comment._content: Great! Thank you for the translation.
comment.authorname: Law Society of Upper Canada Archives
